abstract: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio, in State of the City address, proposes city-wide ferry system with routes operated by private companies.
lead_paragraph: In one of the best-received proposals in his State of the City address, Mayor Bill de Blasio announced plans for a citywide ferry service with stops in, among other places, Astoria and the Rockaways.

headline.main: Mayor de Blasio Moves to Expand Ferry Service in New York City
headline.print_headline: Mayor Plans Ferry Routes to Serve Entire City

snippet: In one of the best-received proposals in his State of the City address, Mayor Bill de Blasio announced plans for a citywide ferry service with stops in, among other places, Astoria and the Rockaways.
